# Life Giver (Hex)
## Overview
*Life Giver (Su)*: Once per day the witch can, as a full round action, touch a dead creature and bring it back to life. This functions as *[[Resurrection (Spell)|resurrection]]*, but it does not require a material component.

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 69
